page.title: 16WILBERFOSS GOING TO WORK
page.content: The list below gives an idea of where people work and the variety of their jobs. OCCUPATION WORKPLACE DISTANCE prison officer Everthorpe 20 mls. Mech. Engineer York 6 mls Timber Merchant Full Sutton 3 mls Driver/handyman Pocklington 4 mls Secretary Leeds 29 mls Shop Assistant Pocklingyon 4 mls Some people such as salesmen stay away from home all week and come home at weekends. Several men are working abroad at present, leaving their families at home in the village. Very few people work in the village but one person works at an agricultural engineers on the main road. Wilberfoss is a good place to travel from as it is near many main roads Most people travel to work by private car or motorcycle.
